text: DuShon Monique Brown (November 30, 1968 â€“ March 23, 2018) was an American actress. She was known for her roles as Nurse Katie Welch on the Fox series Prison Break and Connie in NBC series Chicago Fire. Brown died at a hospital in Olympia Fields, Illinois on March 23, 2018 after suffering chest pains at the age of 49 on March 23, 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago
